feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model
feed.subtitle: ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Deploy RAP Application to SAP Rise
entry.content:
Dear All

We are having SAP Rise ( Private Cloud ) and want to deploy a RAP application directly using Eclipse or Visual Studio. Is there any possibility to skip the cost of Business Application Studio and to deploy a RAP application directly over SAP Rise System rather than deploying it on BTP cloud foundry.

Secondly as Rise system is accessible only through VPN, how the deployed App will be accessed by users through Mobile in field and retail stores.

If deployment of custom RAP App over BTP is the only option and deployment over Rise system is not possible. Do we need licenses of SAP Build Work Zone and SAP Start to access the App deployed over SAP BTP, and how the BTP will be accessing the services as system is only accessible through VPN.

entry.title: ODBC for ABAP error returning Non-ASCII characters
entry.content:
Hi,

have been trying out the ODBC for ABAP connector on ABAP Cloud Trial 2023SP00 on Linux.

Created a CDS view that exposes SBOOK. When retrieving the data I receive non-ASCII codes which result in errors in Excel and other ODBC consumers.

I tried changing the Charset property in odbc.ini but no change.

Any suggestion of why I am not receiving UTF-8 which I think is the default?

Cheers

Ignacio 

Ps: Tests with ODBCforABAP on Windows with Excel for data consumption. No errors.

Checked locale on Linux which is en_US.UTF-8

entry.title: ABAP Environment Trial Account ADT issue
entry.content:

You were successfully authenticated, but an error occurred during the Service Instance logon. Please ensure that your user has the appropriate roles.

Reference link: 

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/sap-btp-abap-environment-and-adt-troubleshooting-guide/ba-p/13527967

entry.title: RAP events feasibility after advance event mesh available for client
entry.content: We have implemented Restful application programming (RAP) for delivery business objects and it is working as expected. Now AEM (Advance event mesh) will be available in client landscape. So we need to know what kind of retrofitting we need to do when the RAP solution is working with AEM. Please suggest some sap links which can be useful to understand the basic of advance event mesh.

entry.title: How to deploy a custom application to a SAP partner demo customizing tenant?
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have create a RAP application in a client's tenant and deployed it to the BPT subbacount cloudfoundry.  The app is available through a site created in SAP Build Workzone.

My requirement is to have that same app available in a SAP Partner Demo Customizing tenant. Is this possible? and what's the best way to achieve this?

Thanks,

entry.title: How to maintain documentation for data elements on Cloud ERP / Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi community,

am I right that there is currently no option to maintain the documentation of a data element (a custom data element) on public cloud?

I mean the long text description/documentation where you can describe the usage of a data element in a long text format.

The reason why I would like to use that, is that I think if I could maintain that documentation, that the help content would be displayed accordingly in custom build Fiori Elements applications. Like it is done for standard data elements which have a documentation. I'm talking about the function on the Public Cloud launchpad when you press F1 in an application or on the question mark button on the top right. SAP Companion which is part of SAP Enable Now. I know that this product will be replaced with SAP WalkMe. But anyway, it would be great to have an option to maintain the long text documentation of custom data elements.

Even if the maintenance of such would be cumbersome (e.g. only creatable by creating a custom class which is creating the text - like it used to be for object like Application Job Catalog entries, before SAP provided UIs for this in Eclipse ADT), I would just love to be able to provide more information on a data element being used in SAP Companion automatically.

Any information on this would be very helpful.

Thank you
Daniel

entry.title: MODIFY ENTITY FOR CREATE I_SALESORDERTP throws dump in batch job
entry.content: We have created custom class in ADT to create manufacturing sales order through EML statement and it successfully creates sales order when I execute the class through ABAP application console. But if the same class is scheduled as job through job template it throws runtime error RAISE_SHORTDUMP in program CX_SADL_SHORTDUMP stating reason Content ID reference 'H001' misses preceding content ID. Please note that the job was successful for MODIFY entities with single value but throws this dump for Modify entities with table as we have to create sales order with multiple lines. Could you please provide suggestions to resolve this issue

entry.title: RAP : Managed with Unmanaged Save with Draft handling Create Mode issue
entry.content:
Hi All,
I have created a Managed app with unmanaged save having code to trigger BAPI to save transactional data.  I have added draft functionality to this app and all works find except for create mode. 

I am able to update root and dependent child node details successfully but when a new Document is created  the earlynumbering_create method is triggered twice and MAPPED table is populated twice.

Thus  cl_numberrange_runtime=>number_get returns 1 Doc # in first run [ Draft mode ]and second run [ After Save is Hit ], Next Document number is generated. This leads to issue that when Document is shown to user a Number is shown

On Save, next Docuement # is crated by method  earlynumbering_create

Could you please suggest if you have came across such issues and solution for the same. 

Thanks !!

entry.title: RAP: fields in 1:1 relationship in object page is not editable
entry.content:
I'm trying to build a Fiori Elements app and trying to display the child entity which 1:1 relationship

define root view entity z_i_parent
     composition [0..1] of z_i_child as _Child

define view entity z_i_child
     association to parent z_i_parent as _Parent on $projection.UUID = _Parent .UUID

I already have the redirect to parent and child composition in projection view

define root view entity z_c_parent
  provider contract transactional_query
  as projection on z_i_parent

   _Child : redirected to composition child z_c_child


define view entity z_c_child
  as projection on z_i_child
    
   _Parent : redirected to parent z_c_parent

Both behavior definintion are maintained and consumption views are exposed in service definition as well.

There are no implemented logic in feature controls yet.

Note: both cds views have a base database table which are custom.

But the result is the child fields are not editable. How can I make the fields editable?

entry.title: RAP: How to enable/disable a field when entering a value on another field in Object Page?
entry.content:
I would to know how can I trigger the feature control when I try to input a value into a field then make another field enable/disable?

I understand there is side effects function but I dont see where I can attach the "features : instance"

edit: i've already applied the field ( features : instance ) MyField; 

but when the features control method is triggered, it doesnt pick up the updated data (entered data). My next question is how can I retrigger the features control after determination on modify?

entry.title: Creating one single FIORI app with two or more FIORI apps or ODATA V4 Servcies as its tabs?
entry.content:
Hi,

I have developed few custom RAP OData V4 applications as list reports with CRUD operations, and I have also deployed them as Fiori apps. Now, I have a user requirement to consolidate a few of these apps into a single application, where each list report should be displayed as a separate tab within this new app.

I have searched blogs related to Fiori elements and the Fiori Elements FPM documentation, but I am unable to determine whether my requirement can be achieved using FPM. If it is possible, could you please suggest how to implement this? If not, is there an alternative way to achieve this using SAP UI5 freestyle application development to integrate the Fiori apps or OData services?

I would appreciate your guidance on the best approach to achieve this. 

Thank you!

entry.title: Multilevel Hierarchy Tree view using RAP
entry.content:
Hi, my requirement is to create a multilevel hierarchy tree view using RAP. I want to know if it's possible and if yes how to do it.

▸ Level 1
├─ ▸ Level 2 Item 1
│          ├─Level 3(Item)
│          └─ Description: of level 3
│          └─ level 3 (item 2)
│          └─ Description: of level 3 item 2
└─ ▸ Level 2 Item 2
            └─ Level 3 (item 1)
            └─ Description: level 3 item 1 

Again multiple level 1 tabs can be present

 

Please help me with this

entry.title: RAP-Root with multiple child with different set of keys for each. How do we build this?
entry.content:
I have to build a root let's say MKPF .

It has a child entity MARA with MATNR as key.

Then a second child with EKES with XBLNR as key.

So we have 2 child entities with different set of keys. All is fine until we reach Projection views. Here we need to have a redirection to parent for "Transactional Projection View must be part of a business object". But when we do this child entities start to throw error about incomplete keys being used.

Can someone help me?

entry.title: sap Cloud authorization Object problem because of namespace to long /asdfghjk/
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

We are working in ABAP Cloud and created a custom namespace with 8 characters:

/asdfghjk/
(10 characters total including the slashes)

We already have thousands of CDS views and other objects created under this namespace.

At the final stage of a complex development, we now need to implement CDS Access Control .
For this, we need to create 4 authorization objects and reference them in CDS access controls.

Problem

Authorization object names are limited to 10 characters, and our namespace alone already consumes all 10 characters:

/asdfghjk/

Because of this:

  • We cannot create authorization objects in this namespace (no space left for a name).

  • CDS Access Controls under /asdfghjk/ can only reference authorization objects from the same namespace.

What we tried

  1. Create a shorter namespace /abc/

    • ✔ We can create authorization objects

    • ❌ We cannot use them in CDS Access Controls under /asdfghjk/ because namespaces differ

  2. Create Z authorization objects*

    • ❌ Same issue: CDS Access Controls in /asdfghjk/ can only reference objects from /asdfghjk/

Constraint

We cannot move all existing objects from /asdfghjk/ to a shorter namespace — this would involve thousands of objects and is not feasible.

Question

Is there any recommended solution or workaround for this situation in ABAP Cloud?

  • Is there a way to reference authorization objects from a different namespace in CDS Access Control?

  • Is there an SAP-recommended approach for long namespaces and authorization objects?

  • Or is this a known limitation with a documented workaround?

Any guidance or best practice would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!
